definitions.definition: impressive and colourful ceremonies, especially traditional ceremonies on public occasions:
examples: The prime minister was received with all the traditional pomp and ceremony that is laid on for visiting heads of government.

definitions.definition: at a time when someone was most successful or popular:
examples: Today his game was reminiscent of that of Pele in his pomp.
After two hours of pomp and circumstance, the diplomas were awarded and the audience went wild.
